question: From the data shown in the chart, what is the most accurate statement about user engagement trends?

options.A: Daily active users increased consistently from June through mid-July 2024.
options.B: User engagement dropped significantly in the third week of July 2024.
options.C: The platform shows steady user growth with minor weekly fluctuations.
options.D: Week 3 July data appears incomplete and may not reflect actual user engagement.

explanation: This line chart displays weekly daily active users with Week 3 July showing only partial-week results (as of July 16, 2024, representing approximately 2 days of the 7-day week). The inappropriate aggregation misleadingly compares incomplete Week 3 July data (125K daily users for 2 days) with complete weekly data from previous periods. While Week 3 July appears to show a dramatic decline in user engagement, this is likely because the week is not yet complete. Weekly user metrics should only be compared when full 7-day periods are available.
